thread.title: Geoffrey Kahn And John Greenburg Join Operations Management Team At Rakuten Super Logistics

author: cnbc.com
title: Geoffrey Kahn And John Greenburg Join Operations Management Team At Rakuten Super Logistics
text:
LAS VEGAS, Rakuten Super Logistics (RSL), the national leader in eCommerce order fulfillment, today announced two key operational management appointments: Geoffrey Kahn joins the company as RSL's National Operations Director, and John Greenburg as West Coast Regional Manager.
"I'm pleased to welcome Geoff and John to the RSL management team," said Mary Marriott, RSL's VP of Operations. "Geoff and John each bring a wealth of experience and knowledge fully in alignment with our company's growth strategy. They are both experienced industry professionals, with extensive logistics backgrounds."
As National Operations Manager, Kahn will provide leadership and coordination for the Operations' organization to ensure RSL goals are met or exceeded, and develop/implement guidelines to increase the velocity of operations.
"I believe that a new job presents opportunity to build new roads for the future, and I'm very excited to join the management team at RSLâ€”helping build the highway for future success," said Kahn.
As an experienced industry leader, Geoffrey brings with him an impressive professional history.
Prior to joining RSL, Geoffrey served as Managing Director, MDM Furniture Limited, where he provided leadership/coordination for the operation's organization; his professional background also includes tenures as Director of Planning, Logistics & Finance at Furniture Origins Trading Ltd., as well as Commodity Manager for HGST and Mylex, a division of IBM.
As West Coast Regional Manager, Greenburg will work with RSL's West Coast Fulfillment Center teams in developing/sustaining Best Practices to foster safety, staff development, operational efficiencies and inventory integrity.
"I believe success is where preparation and opportunity meet, and am thrilled to join the RSL management team," said Greenburg. "I look forward to what I'm certain will be many opportunities and successes ahead."
About Rakuten Super Logistics
Founded in 2001, Rakuten Super Logistics (RSL) is a leader in ecommerce order fulfillment, assisting leading ecommerce retailers to increase speed of delivery, improve order accuracy, decrease shipping costs, and increase customer satisfaction. RSL's cloud-based fulfillment platform for order and inventory management features integration with popular ecommerce platforms, and automatic order importing from online marketplaces, including: Amazon, Magento, WalMart Marketplace, and Shopify. RSL's 2-Day Delivery Network of wholly owned and operated fulfillment centers allows for 1-2 day delivery via ground shipping to 98 percent of the U.S.
